featured.headline: Kana emerges from stealth with $15M to build flexible AI agents for marketers
featured.summary: Kana, a new startup founded by Tom Chavez and Vivek Vaidya, has raised $15 million in seed funding to develop AI agents specifically designed for marketing teams. The platform aims to bridge the gap between static automation and dynamic customer engagement.

secondary_1.headline: Microsoft Office bug exposed confidential emails to Copilot AI

secondary_2.headline: OpenAI pushes into higher education in India to scale AI skills
